title: Item Incinerator
quote: Abyssal Demons have had the abyssal dagger added to their drop table with a drop rate of 1/32k.
name: dagger

title: 300 Million Party & DXP! - This Week In RuneScape
Developer Blog: Artisan Skill
quote: A few weeks ago the artisan skill blew away all competition to win the latest PDC competition with a whopping 49% of the vote. The original concept, which was designed by Pix869, was very strong and we have worked with that design to flesh out the concept further.

title: Update:Q&A Summary 07/04/2022
quote: Maybe there are parts of the tomb we haven't even seen yet see that that's why there's Xerician stuff in there, it came later. As for the tomb being overrun, yeah it probably is connected to all those symbols around and that bloody tomb that collapsed into the floor...

notes: A growth tick is similar to clocks that tick every 5, 10, 20, 40 minutes and so on. This is expanded upon in Farming Mechanics

title: The PvP Arena: Poll Blog
quote: The Calamity Coven sought to emulate their deity and take control of their own fate.

title: The PvP Arena: Poll Blog
quote: Once a bustling hive of healthy competition, under their reign of tyranny it [the Duel Arena] quickly became a dark and corrupt place.

title: The PvP Arena: Poll Blog
quote: Her [Maoma] job was to oversee fights at the arena and ensure that order was upheld – but in reality, she was taking bribes to look the other way. Some say she even instigated some of the fights to make the Arena more popular and recruited prisoners to bolster the fighters' ranks!

title: The PvP Arena: Poll Blog
quote: She [Saika] was in charge of the Arena's economy, making sure to profit from the crowds that came to watch the fights. Her greed knew no bounds as she fudged the numbers for years - claiming the cost of running the place was so high that it barely made any profit. These sketchy numbers made their way to the Emir, and he kept shelling out to keep it going. Unfortunately for him, the funding would go straight to Saika's pocket. She would pay destitute citizens a pittance to pretend they were working, just to keep up her ruse.

title: The PvP Arena: Poll Blog
quote: With a charming personality, she'd make sure the richer visitors had a particularly good time, pampering them with the best seats and service possible. Little did they know of her collaboration with Saika, Maoma, and the thieves they paid to pick the rich guests' pockets.

title: The PvP Arena: Poll Blog
quote: When crowds became tired of certain competitors, you could bet that their bodies would be carried out pierced with barely-visible crossbow bolts – and that Koriff had earned a windfall betting against them.

author: Jagex
title: Guardians of the Rift
notes: Please note, the Catalytic Talisman will only allow access to the Death Altar for those who have completed Mournings End Pt. II and the Wrath Altar only for those who have completed Dragon Slayer II.

title: Tombs of Amascut Drop Mechanics & Osmumten's Fang
Ferox Enclave
quote: Incidentally, the area south-east of the Duel Arena where both minigames used to be is now an abbey, complete with a Cooking range and Prayer altar.

title: Poll 71 and Ferox Enclave Updates
quote: Players can no longer walk inside the blankets near the Citharede Abbey.

title: Continent Expansion
quote: An additional sneak peak welcomes you to Civitas illa fortis. A Roman themed empire of discipline, combat, honour and dominion.

title: Continent Expansion
quote: Civitas illa fortis offers numerous coastal and mainland services such as sea-fishing trawlers, charters and direct access routes across the land-space to various other towns and cities in the area.

title: Continent Expansion
quote: This huge town boasts one of the largest combat training and endurance tests in all of Gielinor, the great Colosseum. As an expansion to the previously popular duel tournaments, the Colosseum will offer the ultimate duelling tournament and experience.

title: Continent Expansion
quote: The Colosseum will match the duel arena in size and scale, only its combat ground will be the same size as all 6 duel arena arenas combined. With spectator seating circling the arena, viewers can watch the ultimate showdown between combatants fighting for the crowds support, and the reward of all entrants’ fees.

title: Dev blog: Content Poll 10 - New Rewards
Revenant Cave Rewards: Revisited, Content Poll & Theatre of Blood
Q&A Summary 07/04/2022
quote: The Dark Altar is not an elder artefact. I'll say that again just to make sure we're all understanding this correctly the way I'm wording this and the way I'm emphasizing this; the "Dark Altar" is not an elder artefact. There's a bit of fun speculation for you from what I mean by that.

author: Mod Ronan
title: Architectural Alliance
quote: The Dark bow special attack has been capped at 48 damage for each arrow.

author: Mod Ronan
title: Architectural Alliance
quote: The Dark bow special attack has been capped at 48 damage for each arrow.

title: Change to Items Lost on Death
Winter Summit Summary
quote: As the name suggests, we're picking up where Desert Treasure left off 17 years ago, to delve deeper into the enigmatic Mahjarrat and the history of a long-forgotten empire…

title: Christmas Event 2018
quote: There’s an added bonus party game this year - as I was tinkering over a weekend and came up with a twist on the traditional party game of pin the tail on the donkey. Head to the north cow field to try it out.

title: Q&A Summary 07/04/2022
quote: Zorgoth was referring to the player. He did not make any mistakes there; he recognised the player. As for what that means, the answer's in a future quest. But not a quest that is planned for anytime soon.

title: Song of the Elves Poll Blog I
Dev blog: Content Poll 10 - New Rewards
quote: The cow mask was made for a random event that we decided not to launch. It involved going to ScapeRune to help the Duke of Bridgelum reassemble dead cows from their component parts.

title: Dev blog: Content Poll 10 - New Rewards
quote: The testers at the time pointed out that the dismembered cow parts looked grotesque ("Please pass me the cow's udders!") so the project was cancelled. We kept the cow mask for posterity. It's mildly grotesque too.

title: Old School Economy - Future Plans
quote: When a taxed trade takes place through the Grand Exchange, we'd allocate an amount of wealth from those taxes to a virtual coffer. This coffer would be used to fund the purchase of specific items that's chosen by us and based on the estimated quantity of the item entering the game per day and the amount we'd like it reduced.

title: Theatre of Blood: Entry Mode Improvements

title: Bush Yield Improvements, Nordic Soft Launch and Mobile Changes

author: The Old School Team
title: Farming Timer Rework & Skilling QoL
quote: Before describing the new system, it's worth taking a moment to say what a growth tick actually is. Imagine the game has clocks that tick every 5 minutes, every 10 minutes, every 20 minutes, every 40 minutes, and so on.

title: Fishing Trawler Improvements and Equipment Rebalance: Part One
Secrets of the North Improvements
quote: to find it you must speak a phrase / to a horseman in an ancient tongue
notes: This message was discovered by clicking on the name " ǝıuɹɐS " found at the bottom of the update post.

title: Gielinor Gazette - February 2023
quote: (...) players discovered a code, which, if mentioned to Diango, would gift them the Mystic Cards item. What? He’s a horseman, he sells horses!

title: The Inferno
quote: The Inferno is the greatest solo PvM challenge ever to be introduced into Old School RuneScape. Beyond sacrificing a Fire Cape, there are no requirements to attempt The Inferno.

title: Death Changes
quote: One major change affects the priestess at Zul-Andra. She previously offered her services for free, but we no longer feel that's appropriate, since Zulrah is so generous with its loot. Once a non-Ultimate Iron player has a Zulrah kill count of 50 or more, she will start charging 100,000 coins to return your items, matching Torfinn's fee. This charge will not apply to Ultimate Iron players.

title: Desert Month Finale
quote: On the west of the river is Menaphos, the Menaphite capital, purported to be a city of great wealth, knowledge and culture.

author: Chris J
title: Desert Month Finale
quote: A bridge across the River Elid has recently been constructed, yet another signal of the warming relations between the Kharidians and the Menaphites, opening up even more areas in our huge desert expansion.

author: Mod Ayiza
title: An Important Announcement
notes: We confirm that a Member of The Old School Team was dismissed from employment at Jagex following gross misuse of moderator privileges.

author: Mod Mat K
title: Mod Reach
quote: Today, Mod Reach was dismissed from employment at Jagex, following an investigation into serious misuse of moderator privileges

title: Nex Drop Table Changes & Monster Examine
quote:
After rolling 1/[43 (as of 30 March 2022)] for the unique table, the chances for a specific item are:
* Torva armour: 2/12 for each piece
* Nihil horn: 2/12
* Zaryte vambraces: 3/12
* Ancient hilt: 1/12

title: Nex Drop Table Changes & Monster Examine
quote: Nexling is based on 1/500, rolled independently from the Unique Table listed above.

title: Guardians of the Rift Improvements
quote: Now that the dust has settled and meta's have been established, we'd like to revert her unique drop rates back to their original rate of 1/43 instead of the current 1/53 to better reflects the kills/hr we had intended during our internal testing.

quote: Osman, known for his peaceful, innocent life relaxing in Al Kharid, has of late been miserably staring into an empty glass of sq'irk juice. For years he was able to deal directly with the sorceress to provide his favourite tipple, before their disagreement over prices. Since then, Osman has tried desperately to find out how she grows them, but the secret is so well kept that not even he can find it.
title: A sq'irk a day...

quote: Regrettably, a single potted plant was harmed while placing the Loot Key chest in the Grand Tree. Let's have a moment of silence before moving on to the rest of this week's changes.

The PvP Arena: Poll Blog
quote: Once a bustling hive of healthy competition, under their reign of tyranny it [the Duel Arena] quickly became a dark and corrupt place.

title: The PvP Arena: Poll Blog
quote: She [Saika] was in charge of the Arena's economy, making sure to profit from the crowds that came to watch the fights. Her greed knew no bounds as she fudged the numbers for years - claiming the cost of running the place was so high that it barely made any profit. title: The Nightmare Poll Results
quote: The tome faced one main source of contention - its introduction to the game would devalue the existing best-in-slot item, the Arcane spirit shield, and the challenging grind offered by the Corporeal Beast. Rumblings among some areas of the community suggested that we were trying to trivialise the magic off-hand grind for Iron accounts.

title: Last Man Standing Beta and Splashing Restrictions
Q&A Summary 07/04/2022
quote: It [the Stone] was in the temple and after the temple was attacked, and the rift was opened, it wasn't safe to keep it there anymore so it got moved to The Fist of Guthix, and then later it was taken back to Morytania but at that point, it was by Zamorakians rather than Saradominists and it was entrusted to Drakan.
name: Stone Timeline

title: Q&A Summary 06/01/2022
quote: The team has been joking about The Stranger in Desert Treasure - if that thing can path find and sprint at you; it would be petrifying! Haha! Players know this but the Strangers' max hit is your max hit, Scary!

title: Collection Log Improvements and The Last of Poll 74
Bird Nest Balancing and PvP Changes
name: BirdNestBalancing

title: Collection Log Improvements and The Last of Poll 74
Q&A Summary 07/04/2022
quote: Those are the three altars that the Saradominists at the time didn't have access to. The Astral Altar was in the way on Lunar Isle so no one else could get to it, the Wrath Altar was already lost at that point. And the Soul Altar was, for anyone who doesn't know, the Soul Altar, the true Soul Altar, not the one on Kourend, is actually deep beneath Menaphos so it was also not available to the Saradominists, that's why those three aren't in there.

title: The Nightmare Poll Results
quote: The tome faced one main source of contention - its introduction to the game would devalue the existing best-in-slot item, the Arcane spirit shield, and the challenging grind offered by the Corporeal Beast. Rumblings among some areas of the community suggested that we were trying to trivialise the magic off-hand grind for Iron accounts.

title: Q&A Summary 07/04/2022
quote: [Is the Scar ever going to be expanded upon further, and even more, are we, the players, ever going to be able to go there?] Yeah. Nice and straightforward. That is one of the things from Temple of the Eye that we intend to explore further. When? How? Why? Who could say, maybe we'll see if Persten survived after all, who knows?

notes: "The grand Sultan of Al Kharid tragically died after he mistook a doormat for his racing rug and plummeted to his death when he jumped off an upper tower of the palace."
